Title: IDF soldiers shoot dead suspected smuggler at Israel-Egypt border...
Description: The army said forces shot at two suspects – one, a Bedouin man who was killed – who posed a threat to them, though they were unarmed. Just as in two incidents in 2024 in which Bedouin civilians were shot dead near the border, the IDF Spokesperson's Unit did not issue a statement

Title: Settlers attack Palestinians in West Bank, one of the victims det...
Description: This incident is the latest in a series of daily assaults and harassment by Israeli settlers against Palestinian residents in the South Hebron Hills, which escalated in recent weeks

Title: Britain's Chief Rabbi pulls out of Israel conference on 'combatin...

Title: Five reportedly killed in Israeli drone strikes in central, south...
Description: The IDF attacks targeted the southern city of Rafah, the Bureij refugee camp and central Gaza, according to reports. The IDF said one strike targeted Gazans who were trying to plant an explosive device near Israeli troops

Title: Israeli lawmaker urges gov't to revoke antisemitism confab invite...
Description: Inviting representatives of extremist parties with antisemitic roots undermines the foundations of the Israeli, Jewish and international struggle against antisemitism,' opposition MK Gilad Kariv wrote in a letter to Netanyahu and two ministers

Title: Israel's lost taboo: How Netanyahu's party is officially embracin...
Description: Netanyahu's party is supercharging its alliance with European far-right nationalists, despite their antisemitism and neo-Nazi ties. The Israeli government's upcoming antisemitism confab, packed with far-right politicians, is set to cement a once-unthinkable pact. The Likud is now an 'integral part of the extreme, illiberal populist right,' one analyst says

Title: Man shot dead in front of family, as homicides in Israeli Arab so...
Description: A witness told Haaretz that assailants broke into 41-year-old Ali Hujirat's home and shot him at close range during preparations for the pre-dawn Ramadan meal

Title: Uninhibited Netanyahu moves to take control of Israel's Shin Bet ...
Description: Netanyahu isn't just removing Shin Bet director Ronen Bar – he's likely to install a compliant replacement who'll follow his orders unquestioningly. If he succeeds, the PM will come dangerously close to achieving full control over the Shin Bet

Description: Camden Market is just one of the projects led by architect Yaara Gooner, who doesn't get miffed by criticisms of gentrification

Title: Raging, petulant, contradictory: How to interpret Trump's Middle ...
Description: Donald Trump's shifting policy announcements, flip-flopping and contradictory statements on Hamas, Gaza and Iran cannot be dismissed as just a lack of clarity or coherence. That's a given. But there's also a deliberate, if destructive, strategy at work

Title: Was Jesus the Real Villain in the Purim Story? This Israeli Schol...
Description: One Jewish history professor believes we should forget everything we think we know about who the villain of the Purim story really is (hint: he was born in Bethlehem and his dad was a carpenter)

Title: A Brief History of Purim, the Halloween of Jewish Holidays
Description: What is its origin? When did it begin? Why did many Jews scorn Purim – and is the underlying tale of love, murder and betrayal true?

Title: Israeli pizzerias named among Asia's best for the second year in ...
Description: Haifa-based NeoPolitan achieved the highest placing for an Israeli pizza in the history of the guide, alongside Jerusalem-based Le Piedra, which was named for the second year in a row on a list of the 50 best pizzas in Asia

Title: Yemen's Houthis to resume attacks on Israeli ships until Israel u...
Description: Houthis say they will renew a naval blockade targeting Israeli–owned vessels passing through Yemen's naval regions, in solidarity with Palestinians in the Gaza Strip after Israel froze incoming aid. The Houthis launched more than 100 attacks targeting shipping from November 2023

Title: Yemen's Houthis to resume attacks on Israeli ships until Israel u...
Description: Houthis say they will renew a naval blockade targeting Israeli–owned vessels passing through Yemen's naval regions, in solidarity with Palestinians in the Gaza Strip after Israel froze incoming aid. The Houthis launched more than 100 attacks targeting shipping from November 2023

Title: Will Syria's leader artfully unite the country's clashing minorit...
Description: Ahmad al-Sharaa recognizes the necessity of establishing Syria as a 'country of the majority of its minorities,' signing new agreements with the Kurds and the Druze, but they might end up as nothing more than historical pieces of paper

Description: Ahmad al-Sharaa recognizes the necessity of establishing Syria as a 'country of the majority of its minorities,' signing new agreements with the Kurds and the Druze, but they might end up as nothing more than historical pieces of paper

Title: Israeli soldiers violently assaulted Palestinian brothers. When t...
Description: The two brothers said soldiers beat, spat on, and threw objects at them, leaving one with a broken hand and genital injuries. When their lawyer complained about Israeli military police investigators laughing during the report, she was told they 'were young and couldn't help it'

Title: Freed Israeli hostage: Collapse of cease-fire meant 'humiliation,...
Description: In a TV interview, Omer Wenkert recounted his daily rations of three dates and half a pita, and the nearly 200 days he spent in solitary confinement deep underground. 'I can't stop thinking about them. People are still there, and just as I promised them, I won't rest until they all come home'

Title: Palestinian Authority condemns Hamas-U.S. direct talks, says grou...
Description: Palestinian political sources say the condemnation indicates the depth of the crisis between the PA and Hamas. The PA is also disappointed with Trump's Lebanese adviser, Massad Boulos, who adopted the Israeli government's narrative without mentioning the Palestinian position

Title: Syria's government signs a breakthrough deal with Kurdish-led aut...
Description: Syria's interim government announced the end of a days-long military operation against insurgents loyal to ousted president Bashar Assad, in the worst fighting since the end of the 13-year civil war in December

Title: Witkoff flies to Qatar to push Hamas, Israel to continue with dea...
Description: Israel's political echelon is demanding that Hamas agree to what it refers to as the Witkoff plan, which calls for releasing half of the living hostages – around 10 people – within the next few days, in one or more phases

Title: Doha, Riyadh, Baghdad: How Arafat's private jet is used for secre...
Description: Once used by former Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, today the private jet has a new owner. Bashar Masri, Palestinian-American tycoon and the jet's owner, has reportedly been shuttling Trump's hostage envoy around the region

Title: Anger and distress about military draft in Israel's ultra-Orthodo...
Description: If people start getting arrested [for avoiding the draft], the Haredi elected officials won't be able to continue sitting and joking with Netanyahu,' said a source involved in Haredi politics.

Title: The Houthis, like Iran and Hamas, use us Palestinians as slogans...
Description: Yemen's Houthis have announced that Israel missed the deadline to lift the blockade of Gaza, and that they will target Israeli shipping. But many in the Strip want the Iran-backed group to stop interfering in Palestinian affairs. 'For the Houthis, we're pawns in a larger scheme,' says one

But many in the Strip want the Iran-backed group to stop interfering in Palestinian affairs. 'For the Houthis, we're pawns in a larger scheme,' says one

Title: We were told that he was killed, but we still hold on to the hop...
Description: On Oct. 7, Ran Gvili answered the call to action and left home to fight terrorist infiltrations in Gaza border communities but never came home. Title: Finding God in Gaza: Why so many Israeli hostages are reconnectin...
Description: More and more testimonies of a newfound interest in Judaism are emerging from recently-released hostages and their families, including ritual observance in captivity. Why would secular hostages turn to Jewish practice under conditions of torture and abuse? How has Israeli society reacted to their stories? And what would Freud say?

Title: Hostages' families give Purim gift baskets with single pita to Is...

Title: Two different 'Qatargates' are plaguing Netanyahu
Description: First came Qatar's cash-filled suitcases to Gaza in the years before October 7, now it's the Israeli prime minister's aides who allegedly did PR work for the Gulf state. For Netanyahu, there's plenty of hysteria to go around

Title: U.S. cuts $400 million from Columbia's funding amid crackdown on ...
Description: The Trump administration pointed to Columbia's 'continued inaction in the face of persistent harassment of Jewish students' as reasoning for canceling the grants and contracts

Title: U.S. cuts $400 million from Columbia's funding amid crackdown on ...
Description: The Trump administration pointed to Columbia's 'continued inaction in the face of persistent harassment of Jewish students' as reasoning for canceling the grants and contracts

Title: Israeli university suspends lecturer who said IDF soldiers 'murde...
Description: Ben-Gurion University said it decided to suspend Ben Daniel as a result of 'a fear Ben Daniel's actions had crossed the line'

Title: Israeli university suspends lecturer who called IDF soldiers 'bab...
Description: Ben-Gurion University said Dr. Sebastian Ben Daniel 'crossed the line' when he claimed that Israeli soldiers 'murder babies, not because of orders, but because they were taught [to do so].'

Title: U.K.'s PM meets released hostage Eli Sharabi, calls his experienc...
Description: Prime Minister Keir Starmer met with Sharabi, whose British-Israeli wife and daughters were murdered on October 7, weeks after his release from Hamas captivity

Title: U.K.'s PM meets released hostage Eli Sharabi, calls his experienc...
Description: Prime Minister Keir Starmer met with Sharabi, whose British-Israeli wife and daughters were murdered on October 7, weeks after his release from Hamas captivity

Title: Weeks later, no one can explain why Israeli troops killed yet ano...
Description: While standing by chance near a kindergarten run by Save the Children in the West Bank village of Sebastia, Ahmad Jazar, 15, was shot to death by an Israeli soldier. 'Since the war in Gaza started,' says the head of the local council, 'there's nothing easier for Israelis than to shoot Palestinians'

Title: Weeks later, no one can explain why Israeli troops killed yet ano...
Description: While standing by chance near a kindergarten run by Save the Children in the West Bank village of Sebastia, Ahmad Jazar, 15, was shot to death by an Israeli soldier. 'Since the war in Gaza started,' says the head of the local council, 'there's nothing easier for Israelis than to shoot Palestinians'

Title: Families of hostages whose bodies remain in Gaza captivity demand...
Description: Yael Adar, whose son Tamir was taken hostage wounded and died in captivity, said Israel's military rabbinate offered to perform a burial ceremony without his body. 'This kind of burial is closure for the government, not for us, she said, adding that the family 'rejected the proposal outright'

Title: Why Hamas sees U.S. hostage talks as an indirect path to politica...
Description: In spite of Donald Trump's threats, Hamas does not see contact with the U.S. as crossing a red line, but as an opportunity to upgrade its status – just as Syrian President Ahmad al-Sharaa did recently

Title: Hamas sees talks with U.S. as an opening for international legiti...
Description: In spite of Donald Trump's threats, Hamas does not see contact with the U.S. as crossing a red line, but as an opportunity to upgrade its status – just as Syrian President Ahmad al-Sharaa did recently

Title: More than 200 killed in Syria clashes between government forces a...
Description: Fighting broke out Thursday near the country's coastal city of Latakia, after 16 government fighters were killed in an ambush, making it some of the worst violence carried out against the government since it assumed power in December

Title: More than 70 killed in Syria clashes between government forces an...
Description: Fighting broke out Thursday near the country's coastal city of Latakia, after 16 government fighters were killed in an ambush, making it some of the worst violence carried out against the government since it assumed power in December

Title: Under gov't pressure, new army chief decides to end tenure of IDF...
Description: Hagari's request to be made the IDF's attache in the U.S. was denied, and the chief claimed he intends to promote officers who took part in Gaza combat. 'The hostages stand before our eyes – a goal of importance like no other,' Hagari wrote to his subordinates after the decision was announced

Title: In Iran, like in Gaza, Trump wields a sledgehammer but lacks a so...
Description: The U.S. President's dismissal of the Egyptian proposal for postwar Gaza shows he's given Netanyahu the reigns, while his aggressive foreign policy against Iran and Ukraine does not seem to be backed by a coherent plan

Title: Evacuated residents of Israel's north are required to return home...
Description: While some kibbutzim in north Israel are seeing their residents return home, other communities are still trying to deal with the war's damage, and hope the state will help them rebuild in time for the next school year

Title: Israeli indicted for driving terrorist who planted explosives on ...
Description: A 35-year-old resident of the central Israeli city of Holon was indicted, and is accused of driving the terrorist who planned last month's bus explosions from Bat Yam to the West Bank. His lawyer said he is held 'Under conditions for a man who made offenses against the state'

Title: Kidnapped? Missing? What really happened to a 9-year-old girl who...
Description: The girlfriend who says she saw what happened, the lapses in security-camera footage, the mysterious rituals at the nearby grave of a kabbala icon, a possible witness who came out of nowhere and then lapsed into a coma. A year has passed since 9-year-old Haymanot Kasau disappeared in Safed

Title: Justice Ministry won't ban Israeli real estate agents from racial...
Description: The code, set to take effect next week, does not include a clause banning racism, despite many calls to do so. This comes after a precedent-setting settlement awarded a group of Arab renters 40,00 shekels after experiencing race-based discrimination

Title: Israeli bank profits are outrageous, and struggling Israelis are ...
Description: While the Israeli economy has been weighed down by war, three of the country's biggest lenders just reported their biggest ever profits. Who's to blame?

Title: BDS: 'No Other Land' normalizes Israeli oppression of Palestinian...
Description: The pro-Palestinian organization said the Oscar-winning film's Israeli team made statements that draw false equivalence between Israelis and Palestinians that 'may be used to rationalize Israel's genocide'

Title: Firing Israel's attorney general won't be easy. These are Netanya...
Description: The justice minister began ousting the attorney general – a process that has only succeeded once in Israel's history. Some say the move is just for show, as Netanyahu's government faces a veritable host of obstacles. Haaretz explains

Title: Sympathy for Israelis among Americans is lowest in decades, poll ...
Description: The poll, conducted in February in the midst of the Israel-Hamas cease-fire and Trump's Gaza takeover plan, reflect Democrats' steady disillusionment with Israel's conduct in the Gaza war following the October 7, 2023, attacks

Title: New Israeli army chief set to present plans to resume fighting in...
Description: The plan that Eyal Zamir is expected to present includes the deployment of several divisions across Gaza, which would require the IDF to enlist more reservists

Title: Trump met the freed Israeli hostages, but did he listen to them?
Description: The optics of the freed hostages meeting the U.S. president are undeniably powerful, granting them agency they were so long denied. Whether their cries will just amount to lip service now depends on Trump

Title: Trump, GOP eye Columbia University as prime target in antisemitis...
Description: As Trump threatens to cut funding to the college over pro-Palestinian protests, investigates the University of California and holds a Senate Judiciary Committee hearing on antisemitism, Democrats accuse the GOP of politicizing the issue. Their actions 'erode the freedoms that've allowed American Jews to flourish,' said one student

Title: Trump, GOP eye Columbia University as prime target in antisemitis...

Title: Trump is an antisemite, Israel bores him': An interview with bio...

Title: It was important to me that he knew we hadn't forgotten him'

Title: Netanyahu rejects demands for Oct. 7 state inquiry in fiery Kness...
Description: Yarden Bibas, in a letter to Netanyahu read by a lawmaker, accused the prime minister of shirking responsibility for October 7. Before the session, Knesset guards forcibly blocked bereaved families from entering, dragging a hostage's father across the floor

Title: Car plows into crowd in Mannheim, killing two, amid recent violen...
Description: The suspect is reportedly a 40-year-old German man. Security has been a concern in Germany following recent violent attacks, including deadly car rammings in Magdeburg and Munich in recent months

Title: Gaza border residents bid farewell to Shlomo Mantzur, oldest host...
Description: Hundreds of Israelis accompanied Shlomo Mantzur's coffin back to his kibbutz – the place from which he was abducted. Many found solace in knowing he was laid to rest in the soil he cherished
